about_the_game:
Story Introduction:


Forbidden love, academy, seven deadly sins.

This is a story about a pair of despicable siblings.


A creepy floating doll has invaded your life, forcing you and your brother to board a hearse leading to hell.

Upon arriving at what is supposed to be hell, you find that it is actually an academy, with a sign next to it reading:

"Welcome to Tartarus Academy."

Outside the academy, there are only desolate and lonely streets.

The sky here remains unchanged, time is frozen, and bodies cease to grow. It seems there is nothing but this academy.

The story unfolds from here.
]
Game Fea

tures:


1. Explore this world and gradually uncover its truths.
2. Simple puzzles to solve.
3. Ability to switch between character controls.
4. Each chapter has slightly different gameplay mechanics.
5. Choices leading to multiple endings.
6.Draw dynamically as you speak.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is intended for adults and contains a significant amount of violent content/bloodshed/sexual innuendo.
Some plot points include descriptions of cannibalism and bullying scenes.
Note: This is a work of fiction, please do not imitate in reality.

detailed_description:
Story Introduction:


Forbidden love, academy, seven deadly sins.

This is a story about a pair of despicable siblings.


A creepy floating doll has invaded your life, forcing you and your brother to board a hearse leading to hell.

Upon arriving at what is supposed to be hell, you find that it is actually an academy, with a sign next to it reading:

"Welcome to Tartarus Academy."

Outside the academy, there are only desolate and lonely streets.

The sky here remains unchanged, time is frozen, and bodies cease to grow. It seems there is nothing but this academy.

The story unfolds from here.
]
Game Fea

tures:


1. Explore this world and gradually uncover its truths.
2. Simple puzzles to solve.
3. Ability to switch between character controls.
4. Each chapter has slightly different gameplay mechanics.

name: 下地狱吧，人渣

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In this side-scrolling adventure puzzle game, you will play as a pair of siblings exploring the "Hell" academy. An eerie floating doll disrupts your peaceful life, forcing you and your brother to embark on a one-way journey to Hell. However, what is known as Hell turns out to be a mysterious academy
